title: India defeats Pakistan in World Cup thriller
description: India clinched a dramatic win against Pakistan in the ICC World Cup, with Kohli scoring a match-winning century.
article: In a match that had fans holding their breath until the very last ball, India emerged victorious over Pakistan in a World Cup thriller that will be remembered for years to come. The game was an absolute nail-biter, with both teams playing with intensity and passion. Pakistan won the toss and elected to bowl first, setting the stage for what would become a thrilling chase. India posted a competitive total of 320 runs, with Virat Kohli playing a masterful knock, scoring an invaluable century under immense pressure. The Pakistan bowlers tried everything in their arsenal but couldn't find a breakthrough, as Kohli's class shone through, guiding his team to a solid total. In reply, Pakistan fought hard, with Babar Azam leading from the front, but they fell short by just 18 runs in the final overs. India’s bowlers were clinical, with Jasprit Bumrah delivering some key overs to seal the game. The win was especially sweet for India, as they had not defeated Pakistan in a World Cup encounter for over a decade. This victory not only strengthened India's position in the tournament but also cemented Kohli's legacy as one of the greatest players to have ever graced the World Cup stage. The match will go down as one of the most thrilling encounters in recent World Cup history, and the rivalry between these two cricketing giants continues to captivate fans around the world.

title: Massive fire breaks out in Delhi market
description: A huge fire erupted in Chandni Chowk market, damaging over 50 shops. Firefighters battled the blaze for hours.
article: A massive fire broke out at the bustling Chandni Chowk market in the heart of Delhi today, causing extensive damage to over 50 shops. The fire, which started in the early hours of the morning, spread quickly due to the narrow lanes and close proximity of the shops. Initial reports suggest that the fire began in a textile shop and rapidly engulfed the surrounding stores. As the fire spread, thick smoke billowed into the air, making it difficult for firefighters to control the flames. Firefighting teams from across the city were rushed to the scene, and they fought the blaze for several hours. Despite their best efforts, it took nearly four hours to bring the fire under control. The cause of the fire is still unknown, though officials have ruled out foul play. While the fire has caused significant property damage, thankfully, no casualties have been reported. Authorities have launched an investigation to determine the cause of the fire and assess the full extent of the damage. Local residents and shop owners have expressed their concern over the safety of the area, as the market is often crowded with both locals and tourists. The fire has left many business owners in despair, with millions of rupees in damage. Emergency services are continuing to provide assistance to those affected, and efforts are being made to support the displaced shopkeepers in the aftermath of the disaster.

title: New AI policy announced by government
description: The Indian government unveils a new AI framework to boost innovation and regulate ethical use of artificial intelligence.
article: The Indian government has announced an ambitious new artificial intelligence (AI) policy aimed at positioning India as a global leader in AI technology. The policy, unveiled by the Minister of Electronics and Information Technology, lays out a comprehensive roadmap for the development and regulation of AI in the country. With a focus on ethical and responsible AI development, the policy aims to foster innovation while ensuring that AI technologies are used in ways that benefit society. One of the key goals of the policy is to promote AI research and development in key sectors such as healthcare, agriculture, manufacturing, and transportation. The government plans to establish AI research hubs and innovation centers across the country to encourage collaboration between academia, industry, and startups. Additionally, the policy outlines strategies for addressing concerns about privacy, data security, and the ethical use of AI. As part of the new framework, the government will set up an AI regulatory body tasked with overseeing the implementation of AI solutions across industries and ensuring compliance with ethical standards. Experts believe that this new policy will not only accelerate the growth of AI technologies in India but also attract global investment in the country's burgeoning AI ecosystem. The Indian government also intends to use AI to solve critical challenges in healthcare, such as improving diagnostic accuracy and streamlining the delivery of medical services. The announcement has been met with widespread support from the tech industry, which sees it as a step in the right direction for India's future as an AI powerhouse.

title: Global Art Expo 2025 opens in Paris
description: The highly anticipated Global Art Expo has opened in Paris, showcasing works from renowned artists worldwide.
article: The much-anticipated Global Art Expo 2025 officially opened its doors today in Paris, drawing art lovers, collectors, and industry experts from all corners of the world. The event, held at the iconic Grand Palais, features works from more than 200 renowned contemporary artists, as well as emerging talents who are making their mark in the art world. The exhibition spans a wide range of mediums, from traditional oil paintings and sculptures to cutting-edge digital art and immersive installations. Some of the most notable pieces include interactive art that responds to viewers' movements and large-scale installations that explore themes of identity, nature, and technology. This year’s expo is particularly focused on the intersection of art and technology, showcasing how new technologies like AI and virtual reality are transforming the way artists create and present their work. In addition to the exhibition, the event includes a series of panels, workshops, and discussions featuring leading figures in the art world. One of the most talked-about moments of the opening day was a panel on the future of digital art and its impact on traditional galleries. As the art world continues to evolve, the Global Art Expo 2025 aims to be at the forefront of these changes, providing a platform for artists to showcase their work to a global audience. The event runs for two weeks and is expected to attract thousands of visitors from around the world, making it one of the most important cultural events of the year.

title: Scientists discover new exoplanet in habitable zone
description: Astronomers have discovered a new exoplanet located in the habitable zone of its star, opening new possibilities for extraterrestrial life.
article: In a remarkable discovery, astronomers have identified a new exoplanet located in the habitable zone of its star, a region where conditions may allow for the presence of liquid water—considered essential for life as we know it. The exoplanet, designated HD 12345b, is located approximately 150 light-years away in the constellation Lyra. It is similar in size to Earth and is thought to have a rocky surface, making it an ideal candidate for further study. The discovery was made using the latest advancements in telescopic technology, including data collected from the James Webb Space Telescope. According to the research team, HD 12345b orbits its star at a distance that allows for the right temperatures to support liquid water, a crucial factor in determining a planet's habitability. While the planet's atmosphere and surface conditions are still unknown, scientists are excited by the possibility that it could harbor life. The discovery is being hailed as one of the most significant in the search for extraterrestrial life and adds to the growing list of potentially habitable exoplanets. Researchers are planning follow-up observations to study the planet's atmosphere in greater detail and to assess its potential to support life. If future studies confirm the presence of water or an atmosphere conducive to life, HD 12345b could become one of the most studied exoplanets in history.
